name: Arachtron
description:
ARACHTRON

ARACHTRON is a 3rd-person Sci-Fi shooter game  that takes place on the surface of the moon. As such, it leaves the essence discovery up to the player whilst hiding just around the corner with the constant threat of low-gravity lunar combat.

Developed by Metabug Studio for the 2021 GitHub GameOff game jam.  Huge thanks to Nekpane Interactive for the guidance and to our QA Tester for making sure our entry meets the fleeting quality standards of this modern age!!

GitHub Source:
https://github.com/MetabugStudio/Arachtron

//---------------------------------------
Minimmum System Requirements:

CPU: Intel Core i5 (or better)
GPU: NVidia GTX 1650 (or better)
RAM: 6 GB (or more)
Free Space: 5 GB (or more)
//---------------------------------------

Powered by Unreal Engine 4
Images courtesy of NASA

Contains 3D assets from these packs:

- Brushify by JoeGarth
- Crosshairs Pack by Daniel1291
- Colorama by Alex Leiva
- Mech Spider by Industry3D
- Dynamic Suit by Coreb Games
- SciFi Weapons Dark by Ying Pei Games
